content: ffffaaaabbbb 55550000 ssssccccaaaarrrrffff ffffaaaabbbb 55550000 ssssccccaaaarrrrffff size adult width- 20 cm/ 8 in length- 165 cm/ 65 in yarn 100g ball 50 by estelle yarns col iris 83 % mulesing-free extrafine superwash merino 17 % recycled nylon 340 m/ 371 yd needles a pair of 5 mm/ us 8 gauge 17 sts and 26 row = 10 cm/ 4 in over pattern st a beginner level scarf pattern to warm up your winter in celebration of estelle yarns 50th anniversary a family-owned canadian company founded by iris and phillip peacock in 1976 abbreviations k knit meas measure p purl repeat repeat st stitch pattern st row 1-6 k2 k5 p5 repeat to last 2 sts k2 row 7-12 k2 p5 k5 repeat to last 2 sts k2 repeat these 12 row to form pattern cast on 34 sts work in pattern st until work meas approx 165 cm/ 65 in ending with a row 5 or 11 cast off all sts on next row in pattern st cut yarn and sew in ends fringes optional make 14 fringes using 5 strands of yarn per fringe approx 23 cm/ 9 in long attach 7 fringes to each end of scarf design by michele meadows www muskokayarnconnection shop
